description: Ludobox is a collection of games and resources around Print'n Play (DIY games to craft yourself). It gathers dozens of files, instructions, tutorials about the creation and fabrication of games, alone or with others. The Ludobox collection is distributed online or on-site though its physical toolbox and dedicated workshops.

make.main: Print'n play are games that you can make by yourself.
make.line1: From a card game in PDF using a printer and scissors
make.line2: to a board game accessing a 3D printer to reproduce tokens,
make.line3: Ludobox invites to materialize & craft digital files.

download.title: Make your own box
download.line1: You can build your own box from scratch
download.line2: or directly download games from our online collection.

map.title: Join The Network
map.text: Everyone is welcome to grow the collection through games design, remix and translation, to develop the device, mediate a workshop or organize an event in his or her own district !
